about_the_game:
According to legend, in ancient times, there was a mysterious scroll of the Black Loong. Everyone who obtained it was granted its mystical powers, yet each met with a catastrophic end — and so did your family. Fortunately, on that dark night, you escaped successfully with the scroll. Sensing your longing for family, the scroll granted you a lovely sister.
For six years, you wandered with your sister until you found shelter in a remote town. You decide to give her a better life, but how will you raise her? What kind of life will your choices lead her to? That is the question.

The only family



As your sister’s sole guardian, you must ensure she grows up healthy and happy in her daily life and studies, exploring new hobbies and interests together. Your sister is always eager to learn new things, so trying out various jobs and activities will be crucial.
Perhaps you will endeavor to achieve many things and face many challenges in the future, but remember, the bond between you two will never changed.

Growing up with your sister



Pay attention to your sister’s growth; she is a curious little girl who, under your guidance, will gradually learn how to interact better with others and acquire a variety of knowledge under different teachers - music, painting, writing, herbalism, kung fu, and even mysterious Taoist practices. But if you’re not careful, she might stray from the right path.

Interacting with the residents of the town



In the town live some interesting residents; don’t forget to interact with them, as each one is very willing to become friends with you!

The Ever-Lurking Crisis



As you and your sister grow to love this tranquil life, the assassins have not forgotten about you. They could discover clues at any moment and rush to destroy your life and seize the scroll you’ve hidden. Whether you choose to continue hiding or bravely confront your enemies, your sister will stand firmly by your side, even showcasing her abilities and becoming your good assistant in the process.

Collect Different Endings



What will your sister become? A renowned master? An ordinary farmer? Or will she succumb to darkness? Can she completely break away from your family’s past and lead a new, better life? Remember, every decision you make will affect your sister’s future!
